subject: Fix OneSignal service worker registration and add diagnostics
body:
- Add Service-Worker-Allowed header for OneSignalSDKWorker.js to ensure proper scope
- Add Cache-Control header to prevent service worker caching issues
- Add service worker registration diagnostics to log active workers and their states
- Help debug "Could not get ServiceWorkerRegistration to postMessage" error in production

This addresses the Chrome error where OneSignal SDK cannot communicate with its service worker.
title: Fix OneSignal service worker registration and add diagnostics
